resources.string: Viaplay GameCenter-F V 1.21 Powered by Viaplay Corporation
Use floating winows to capture screen?
Please move the floating icon, if the game can not resume.
Viaplay GameCenter can not get root access!
Viaplay GameCenter can not get root access. Touch mapping functionality will not be available until the device is rooted
The device needs to reboot, or can not properly use the mapping function of Viaplay GameCenter

Viaplay GameCenter-F is a powerful touch/key mapping app for Android. It is available free on Google Play™ for Via-Gamepad F
 
	 owners. With the Viaplay GameCenter-F, users can map specific touch areas of Android games to buttons on viaplay Smart Controllers,
 
	 or remap keyboard presses to specific gamepad buttons on Viaplay Smart Controllers. When used with the Via-Remote F, Viaplay
 
	 GameCenter-F can add compatibility for touch-only Android games or HID games.



	 Touch Mapping Instruction:
 
	 1. Enter Viaplay GameCenter-F , and go to “Touch Mapping”.
 
		 a) “Select to activate Touch Mapping” and change the input method to “Viaplay Mapping F”.
 
		 b) “Select to activate floating icon”.
 
	 Note: “Touch Mapping” is a gaming input method for Viaplay smart controllers, not for text input. Please change back to the 
 
				 previous input method after use.
 
	 2. Touch Mapping should be performed within the desired game:
 
		 a) Start the game and navigate to the screen showing the desired touch mapping areas.
 
		 b) Click the floating Viaplay icon to capture a screenshot of the game screen. 
 
		 c) Select the desired touch point or virtual joystick on the screen, and then push the corresponding button on the controller.
 
		 d) Press “Save” and “Exit” to quit Touch Mapping and start gaming.
 
	 3. After gaming, please long press the Viaplay floating icon to change to previous setting.
\t Your device has not yet get root permissions, so can not use advanced functions like touch mapping, it would only support limited games. \n
